page.title: 091st.AUDLEY GIRL GUIDES CONT.
page.content:
We sang more songs such as "Brownie Bells".The music advisor for the Guides and Brownies is Mrs.Holmes and she organised all the songs we sang and she also sang along with us.At the end of the evening we sang a song called "Taps".It is called this because it usedto be accompanied by someone tapping a small drum. "TAPS" "Day is done, Gone the sun, From the sea,from the hills, from the sky, All is well,Safety rest, God is nigh."
At the end of each Guide meeting we sing this song.After singing it this celebration day we all went home at 8.30pm. Lisa Garlick.
